pageContext.claim: “And you hear about certain places like Chicago and you hear about what's going on in Detroit and other -- other cities, all Democrat run. Every one of them is Democrat run. Twenty out of twenty. The 20 worst, the 20 most dangerous are Democrat run. We have one city or two cities in particular -- worse than Honduras, worse than Afghanistan. Worse than Afghanistan.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a flawed apples-to-oranges comparison. You can't properly compare crime rates in cities with countries that have a mix of urban and rural areas. For instance, Baltimore, a common target of Trump's barbs. is a city. It would be more relevant compare the state of Maryland to these countries: The state had a homicide rate of 9 per 100,000 people, compared to Honduras (41).
